mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectBskWishlstGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ WISHLST_SN , GOD_TURN , GOD_NO , ITM_NO , ITM_QTY , WISHLST_REG_DT , PCKAGE_GOD_YN , UTID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM BSK_WISHLST_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND WISHLST_SN = #{wishlstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND GOD_TURN = #{godTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
